statements: SELECT * FROM user_access_controls WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, access_level FROM user_access_controls WHERE access_level = 'admin';
SELECT * FROM user_access_controls WHERE inventory_access = TRUE AND activity_tracking = FALSE;
SELECT username, access_level FROM user_access_controls WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM user_access_controls WHERE access_level = 'user';
SELECT * FROM user_access_controls WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM user_access_controls WHERE access_level = 'Admin';
SELECT username, access_level FROM user_access_controls WHERE inventory_access = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM user_access_controls WHERE activity_tracking = FALSE ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT access_level FROM user_access_controls WHERE user_id IN (2, 4, 6);
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, role FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT user_id, username, password FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_activity WHERE user_id = 3 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(activity_id) FROM user_activity GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, role FROM users ORDER BY role DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, role FROM users WHERE role = 'admin' ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT ua.activity_description, ua.timestamp, u.username FROM user_activity ua JOIN users u ON ua.user_id = u.user_id;
SELECT u.username, COUNT(ua.activity_id) AS num_activities FROM users u JOIN user_activity ua ON u.user_id = ua.user_id GROUP BY u.username HAVING num_activities > 1 ORDER BY num_activities DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, role FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT product_name, quantity, price FROM inventory WHERE price > 50.00;
SELECT user_id, activity_type, timestamp FROM user_activity WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT * FROM inventory ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM users WHERE role = 'manager';
SELECT user_id, activity_type, timestamp FROM user_activity WHERE activity_type = 'login' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT user_id, username, role FROM users WHERE role IN ('admin', 'manager') AND user_id > 100 ORDER BY username;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, role FROM users WHERE role='Admin';
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM inventory_data WHERE price > 100;
SELECT user_id, activity_description, timestamp FROM user_activity ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT username, role FROM users WHERE role='Admin' ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT username, role FROM users WHERE role = 'Admin';
SELECT item_name, quantity, price FROM inventory_data WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT user_id, activity_description, timestamp FROM user_activity WHERE user_id = 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT u.username, r.role_name, a.activity_description FROM users u JOIN user_roles r ON u.role = r.role_name JOIN user_activity a ON u.user_id = a.user_id ORDER BY u.username ASC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, role FROM users WHERE role='admin';
SELECT user_id, username, role FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT user_id, role FROM users ORDER BY role DESC;
SELECT user_id, role FROM users WHERE role='customer' ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT user_id, username, role FROM users;
SELECT role_name, description FROM roles ORDER BY role_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, role_name, description FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id JOIN roles ON user_roles.role_id = roles.role_id WHERE users.role = 'Admin';
SELECT item_name, price FROM sensitive_inventory WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY item_name ASC;
SELECT user_id, username, action, timestamp FROM access_logs WHERE action = 'Login' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
